Name: Skyward Pride
Title: Sky-Rippin: Skyward Pride
Desc: This is a tale of sky-shaking valor. Bearing the will to defend all, let the wind dragon bestow wrath upon its vile nemesis.

Talent.Name: Skyward Pride
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> This character's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 additional DMG.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3203}Claymore Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
